message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.PL. 

The paper deals with the synthesis of control policies in unknown, stochastic environments, which is a problem commonly studied in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and robotics (cs.RO). The use of temporal logic specifications also suggests a connection to the field of programming languages (cs.PL), where temporal logic is often used to specify program behavior. Finally, the use of Markov decision processes (MDPs) suggests a connection to the field of control systems (cs.SY).
